```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

### load relevant packages

library(tidyverse)
library(foreign)
```

Load data and select relevant variables

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## load raw data

data2008 <- read.spss("C:/Data Mattheus 2.0/Sociale Index enquete 2008 edit.sav", use.value.labels = FALSE, to.data.frame = TRUE)

View(data2008)

#### select relevant variables, based on "Overzicht variabelen waves Wijkprofiel v2.xlsx"

data2008sel <- data2008 %>% select(v1, v2, v3a, v4, v5, etni, v9, v12d, v13, v14a_1, v14a_2, v14a_3, v14a_4, v18a, v18b, v18c, v18d, v18e, v18f, v18g, v18h, v18i, v18j, v18k, v18l, v23b, v24a, v27, v28, v29a, v33, v48a, v48b, v48c, v49, v55a, buurt, ijssel, GEWICHT_STAD, WAVEID)

```

Data transformations 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## recode and rename variables

class(data2008sel$v2)
data2008sel$v2[data2008sel$v2==2] <- 0

data2008sel <- data2008sel %>% rename(Age = v1, Male = v2)

```
